translation.de: Ich habe den Typen noch nie gesehen. Wie ist er so?

translation.en: Dishonest.
Deceitful.
[chuckles] How would you know that?
Because I found him attractive.
[Cole] Here we go!
You wanna watch Eddie chop wood?
translation.de: Willst du sehen, wie Eddie Holz hackt?

translation.en: [Franny] Yeah!
Chop.
Chop.
Chop.
"All of us on Earth are associated
translation.de: "Wir alle auf der Erde sind mit denen

translation.en: with those in the spiritual world who are like ourselves."
translation.de: in der spirituellen Welt verbunden, die wie wir waren.

translation.en: "We are, in a sense, united to them."
translation.de: Wir sind gewissermaßen mit ihnen vereint."

translation.en: [ghostly voice] United to them…
-[chopping wood continues] -[Catherine] What do you want?
What are you looking for here?
[chuckling] I… I don't really know.
You're a presumptuous fucker, aren't you?
If you're coming in, shut the door behind you.
translation.de: Wenn du reinkommst, mach die Tür hinter dir zu.

translation.en: He's got a social life at that school, and I'm isolated.
translation.de: Er hat ein soziales Leben an der Uni, und ich bin isoliert.

translation.en: [woman] Something's wrong. I can hear it in your voice.
translation.de: Irgendwas stimmt nicht. Ich höre es dir an.

translation.en: I…
I'm starting… to see things.
And I'm scared to tell George about it.
translation.de: Und ich habe Angst, George davon zu erzählen.

translation.en: -Catherine, have you been eating? -[sighs]
What's the church like up there? Have you prayed on any of this?
translation.de: Wie ist die Kirche da oben? Hast du auch gebetet?

translation.en: Try to remember how he did right by marrying--
translation.de: Denk dran, dass er dich heiratete…

translation.en: Oh, I gotta go. Thanks a lot for the pep talk, Mom. I love you.
translation.de: Ich muss auflegen. Danke für die Hilfe. Mom, hab dich lieb.

translation.en: [Catherine] That was some run.
Yeah, I guess I went pretty far. I don't know what came over me.
translation.de: Ja, ich bin ziemlich weit gelaufen. Ich weiß nicht, was über mich kam.

translation.en: And then I-I got distracted by these wildflowers.
translation.de: Dann wurde ich von diesen Wildblumen abgelenkt.

translation.en: Thanks, but now you're going to be late for class.
translation.de: Danke, aber jetzt kommst du zu spät zum Unterricht.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, I know. I-I'd better hustle.
translation.de: Ja, ich weiß. Ich sollte mich beeilen.

translation.en: [Cole] Look who's home.
-[Cole] What are you doing? -One sec.
Mr. Claire, right?
It's nice to finally meet you. I'm Eddie.
translation.de: Endlich lerne ich Sie kennen. Ich bin Eddie.

translation.en: -My brother and I are about to get-- -The Vayle boys, aren't you?
translation.de: -Mein Bruder und ich… -Ihr seid die Vayle-Jungs, oder?

translation.en: Not anymore, sir.
We go by Lucks now. Took our uncle's last name.
translation.de: Wir heißen jetzt Lucks. Der Nachname meines Onkels.

translation.en: Do me a favor. My… my wife doesn't know that you lived here. Uh, or what happened.
translation.de: Tu mir einen Gefallen. Meine Frau weiß nicht, dass ihr hier lebtet und was war.

translation.en: I think it would be better if we kept it that way.
Uh, she's a nervous woman and, uh…
translation.de: Sie ist eine nervöse Frau und…

translation.en: well, she wouldn't want you around if she found out.
translation.de: Sie würde euch sonst nicht hier haben wollen.

translation.en: Sure, Mr. Claire.
My brother and I are only here for honest work. Thank you. I appreciate it.
translation.de: -Mein Bruder und ich arbeiten ehrlich. -Danke. Das weiß ich zu schätzen.

translation.en: It seems a… little odd, no?
That you'd want to be here at all.
translation.de: Dass ihr überhaupt hier sein wollt.

translation.en: Taking care of this house comes second nature to us.
translation.de: Die Pflege des Hauses liegt uns im Blut.

translation.en: Right.
Did you meet your husband in art school?
translation.de: Sie lernten sich an der Kunstuni kennen?

translation.en: Yeah, we were undergrads together.
That's cool.
[Catherine] Were your parents supportive of you studying music?
Yeah, my mom was the one who taught me.
translation.de: Meine Mom hat es mir beigebracht.

translation.en: But when my father found my application, he, uh… he beat me with a two-by-four.
translation.de: Aber als mein Vater meine Bewerbung fand, setzte es Prügel.

translation.en: Are you serious?
Yeah.
Yeah, he actually bloodied me up pretty good.
Well, if you decide to reapply to music school,
translation.de: Falls du dich noch mal bewirbst,

translation.en: I will personally write you a check for your application.
translation.de: stelle ich dir einen Scheck für die Anmeldung aus.

translation.en: You really got me.
-Hey, George. -[music stops]
Eddie-- Eddie was just playing his favorite Louis Armstrong song for me.
translation.de: Eddie spielte gerade seinen Lieblingssong von Louis Armstrong für mich.

translation.en: -Called-- What's it called? -"Someday You'll Be Sorry."
[chuckling] That's right. That's the story of my life.
translation.de: Stimmt. Das ist die Geschichte meines Lebens.

translation.en: What a surprise.
Eddie was telling me earlier how he was here for honest work.
translation.de: Eddie sprach heute früh von ehrlicher Arbeit.

translation.en: I-- I didn't realize that it included entertainment.
translation.de: Ich wusste nicht, dass sie Unterhaltung umfasste.

translation.en: We finished painting, sir,
and, uh, Mrs. Claire asked me to play something before I left.
translation.de: und Mrs. Claire bat mich, etwas zu spielen, bevor ich gehe.

translation.en: -So-- -Wait, Eddie, Eddie.
Come on, please. Don't stop on my account.
translation.de: Komm, bitte. Meinetwegen musst du nicht aufhören.

translation.en: I've been called many things before, but never a party pooper.
translation.de: Man nannte mich schon vieles, aber nie Spaßbremse.

translation.en: Well, the man of the house has spoken,
translation.de: Der Herr des Hauses hat gesprochen,

translation.en: so finish the goddamn song, Eddie.
translation.de: also spiel das verdammte Lied zu Ende.

translation.en: Yeah, please.
Shit.
Oh God.
-[ghostly voice] Catherine. -[gasps, gags]
[George] What you do to me, you do not know.
translation.de: Du hast keine Ahnung, was du mir antust.

translation.en: My God.
I've never done anything like this before, you know.
translation.de: Ich habe so etwas noch nie gemacht.

translation.en: What's wrong?
What? I'm just talking.
-Sharing. -What the fuck is wrong with me?
-Why do I keep doing this? -Hey, Willis, I'm being serious.
translation.de: -Warum mache ich das? -Willis, ich meine es ernst.

translation.en: It'd be nice to know you a bit better.
Some ordinary, regular things.
That's not what this is about.
Ow! What the hell?
You think because I fuck you, I'm fooled by you?
translation.de: Glaubst du, weil ich dich ficke, kannst du mich verarschen?

translation.en: I've been around guys like you my whole life.
translation.de: Typen wie dich kenne ich seit jeher.

translation.en: -What the hell are you talking about? -My dad made a fortune defending them.
translation.de: -Wovon redest du? -Mein Dad hat ein Vermögen damit verdient.

translation.en: Thieves, con men, psychopaths.
And they all got off because that's the way the world works for men.
translation.de: Und alle kamen davon, denn so funktioniert die Welt für Männer.

translation.en: Okay, look, I see that you have some pretty awful ideas about men.
translation.de: Ok, du hast furchtbare Vorstellungen von Männern.

translation.en: I have awful ideas about everything.
translation.de: Ich habe furchtbare Vorstellungen von allem.

translation.en: Now get the fuck up.
-Come on, Willis. -No.
I'm done with this.
Willis! Willis!
-[Justine] Hi! -Trick or treat?
-Come in, come in. -Hello, I'm Catherine.
-Oh, of course you are. Mmm. -Oh.
[chuckles] George, hi.
-Hi. For you. -Oh, thank you.
Bram, where are you? The Claires have arrived.
translation.de: Bram, Schatz, wo bist du? Die Claires sind da.

translation.en: -Wow. -[Bram] I'm here.
translation.de: Bram, Schatz, wo bist du? Die Claires sind da. -Ich bin hier. -Unglaublich.

translation.en: [George] Amazing.
-[Justine] Thanks. -Hello.
-I'm Catherine. -Hey, Bram.
-Thanks for having us. -Look what they brought us.
translation.de: -Danke für die Einladung. -Das ist für uns.

translation.en: -Thank you. How are you? -Very well.
-Come on in. -Beautiful.
-Thank you. -I love your artwork.
Ah. Well, yes. We're just enjoying our tenure here while it lasts.
translation.de: Wir genießen unsere Zeit hier, solange sie dauert.

translation.en: -Oh, do you rent? -No, no, no.
[laughing] He just means how these old Hudson Valley homes are.
translation.de: Diese alten Hudson-Valley-Häuser sind ja so.

translation.en: We think we own them, we're just caretakers. [laughing] They outlive us all.
translation.de: -Im Grunde sind wir immer nur Hausmeister. -Sie überleben uns alle.

translation.en: My wife thinks ours is haunted.
translation.de: Meine Frau denkt, in unserem spukt es.

translation.en: -Well, she's probably right. -[laughs] They're all haunted a bit.
translation.de: Sie hat wahrscheinlich recht. In allen spukt es.

translation.en: After all, we're in Headless Horseman country.
translation.de: Der kopflose Reiter war ja von hier.

translation.en: [laughs] Let me take your coats.
Oh, actually, we should go outside and look at the alpacas before they nap.
translation.de: Wir sollten uns draußen die Alpakas ansehen, bevor sie schlafen.

translation.en: -Oh, yes. -This way.
-You'll love it. -Alpacas nap?
Where does one buy such quality weed up here?
translation.de: Wo kauft man so gutes Gras?

translation.en: -[Bram] Buy? I grow it. -[George] Nice.
You know, I came up here to write the Great American Novel, but…
translation.de: Ich wollte hier den Great American Novel schreiben, aber…

translation.en: I spend most of my time tending to my garden, if you get my drift.
translation.de: Die meiste Zeit pflege ich meinen Garten, wenn du verstehst.

translation.en: I love your setup. It's amazing.
-Aww, thank you. -And your work is so unique.
Thanks. It's gonna sound a little strange,
but it's a spiritual thing for me, weaving.
translation.de: aber es ist eine spirituelle Sache für mich, das Weben.

translation.en: I tap into something cosmic when I'm working.
translation.de: Bei meiner Arbeit erreiche ich eine kosmische Ebene.

translation.en: -Its patterns, you know? -Yeah. Sometimes I feel guilty taking credit for it.
translation.de: Die Muster. Manchmal fühle ich mich schuldig, es als meins auszugeben.

translation.en: Why? You shouldn't.
I would love for you to make something for my Franny.
translation.de: Ich möchte, dass du etwas für Franny machst.

translation.en: -I'd pay you, naturally. -Don't be silly. I'll do it for cost.
translation.de: -Ich würde bezahlen. -Sei nicht albern. Nur Material.

translation.en: Oh, actually, George already asked for a scarf for his mother,
translation.de: George bat schon um einen Schal für seine Mutter,

translation.en: so I'll just add it to that order.
Okay.
-You guys just have the one child? -Yeah. Yes.
She's four. And you and Bram? Do you guys have kids?
translation.de: Sie ist vier. Und du und Bram? Habt ihr Kinder?

translation.en: No.
Bram and I were conflicted about that for a while,
translation.de: Bram und ich waren uns eine Weile uneins,

translation.en: and then Mother Nature made the final decision.
translation.de: dann traf Mutter Natur die endgültige Entscheidung.

translation.en: And she made the right one.
It all worked out perfectly.
I was conflicted, too, but just like that, it…
translation.de: Ich war auch unsicher, aber dann…

translation.en: It happened.
And then we got married, which I was also conflicted about.
translation.de: Und dann heirateten wir, da war ich auch unsicher.

translation.en: I guess you could say I'm a conflicted Catholic girl at heart,
translation.de: Man kann wohl sagen, ich bin eine unsichere Katholikin,

translation.en: dutifully going through the motions.
You know, the first few years of our marriage
translation.de: Die ersten paar Jahre unserer Ehe waren

translation.en: were a complete blur because of the baby and school.
translation.de: wegen des Babys und der Uni völlig verschwommen.

translation.en: We're really still trying to catch our breath up here.
translation.de: Hier kommen wir wirklich zum ersten mal zur Ruhe.

translation.en: You know, I attend this women's group.
It's an Arts Club… thing.
translation.de: Es ist so ein Arts Club.

translation.en: We meet once a month up in Albany, and there are so many creative ladies to meet, Catherine.
translation.de: Wir treffen uns einmal im Monat in Albany, und da sind so viele kreative Frauen.

translation.en: I think you should come with me.
translation.de: Ich denke, du solltest mal mitkommen.

translation.en: I would love something like that. I don't know anybody up here.
translation.de: Ich würde so etwas lieben. Ich kenne hier niemanden.

translation.en: Well, you do now.
It must be so nice
to inherit a fortune
and then spend all day not writing a book.
translation.de: und dann den ganzen Tag kein Buch zu schreiben.

translation.en: I really like them, especially her. She's so interesting.
translation.de: Ich mag sie sehr, besonders sie. Sie ist so interessant.

translation.en: She's so free with herself and her body.
translation.de: Sie ist so frei mit sich und ihrem Körper.

translation.en: She can certainly put away some lasagna.
-That's a nasty thing to say. -Come on, I'm kidding.
translation.de: -Das ist fies. -Komm, ich mache nur Spaß.

translation.en: I like them, too.
I especially like…
[sniffs] …Bram's weed.
Are you sure you're okay to drive after smoking so much?
translation.de: Kannst du nach all dem Gras noch fahren?

translation.en: Yeah.
-I'm fine. I'm more than okay. -Really?
-Watch this. -[engine accelerating]
George, slow down.
-Slow down, George. -Really? -Really? -George, slow down!
[yelling] Slow down!
-[Catherine] Stop, George! -[George] Whoo!
God, what the hell are you doing?
What? What, I'm just having a little fun.
translation.de: Was? Ich habe nur etwas Spaß.

translation.en: You remember what that was like, Cath, huh?
translation.de: Weißt du noch, wie das war, Cath?

translation.en: -That's not funny! -[laughing] Come on.
Oh, come on, Cath. Cath!
Catherine!
translation.de: Catherine, wo willst du denn hin?

translation.en: Cath, where are you going? Come on, get back in the car.
translation.de: Catherine, wo willst du denn hin? Komm zurück ins Auto.

translation.en: -Cath! -Get your hands off me!
God, we are two smart people.
-We should've known better. -Known what?
That I'm only here for the imaginary book jacket bio
translation.de: Ich bin nur hier wegen deiner imaginären Buchrückseiten-Bio,

translation.en: that you have in your fucking head.
translation.de: die du in deinem Scheißkopf hast.

translation.en: The-- the-- the professor with the wife and the country home.
translation.de: Der Professor mit der Frau und dem Landsitz.

translation.en: I gave up everything for you!
translation.de: Ich gab alles auf für dich!

translation.en: Oh God, I'm so sorry. I'm so sorry I fucked up both of our lives!
translation.de: Gott, es tut mir so leid, dass ich unser Leben versaut habe!

translation.en: And the worst part is this is all I have.
translation.de: Und das Schlimmste ist, das ist alles, was ich habe.

translation.en: Cath, you know what you do have? Is the crying drunks.
translation.de: Cath, weißt du, was du hast? Säuferelend.

translation.en: You are a person who should not drink alcohol,
translation.de: Du bist eine, die keinen Alkohol verträgt,

translation.en: especially when you do not fucking eat anything!
Oh my God. I am so sick of everybody blaming everything
translation.de: Oh Gott. Ich habe es satt, dass alle es nur darauf schieben,

translation.en: in my fucking life on me not eating!
Please, get back in the goddamn car!
translation.de: Steig wieder in das verdammte Auto.

translation.en: -Get off of me! -[cries out] Ow!
Fuck!
-[groans] -Oh my God. Cath?
Oh my God. Cath…
I'm so sorry. I'm so sorry. Was that…
translation.de: Es tut mir so leid. War das…

translation.en: Did I… Did I…
Cath, are you okay?
Come on, Cole. Get up. I'll drive you home.
translation.de: Cole, steh auf. Ich fahre dich heim.

translation.en: [George] Hey, Cath?
I didn't mean to hurt you.
I would never hurt you.
But I also…
I have not been sensitive to your needs for some time.
translation.de: Ich habe längere Zeit deine Bedürfnisse ignoriert.

translation.en: And for that, I owe you an apology.
translation.de: Und dafür muss ich mich entschuldigen.

translation.en: More than an apology.
One thing I do know…
[voice breaks] …is I love you.
-[glass shatters] -[Franny] What was that?
Oh God. Jesus. What?
[Catherine] It's okay, baby.
[whispering] Nothing happened. It's okay. It's okay.
translation.de: Es ist nichts passiert. Schon gut.

translation.en: [woman] "We look at each other, and we are not ashamed."
translation.de: "Wir sehen uns an und schämen uns nicht.

translation.en: "I wearing the face of the proper marriage,
translation.de: Ich trage das Gesicht der richtigen Ehe,

translation.en: you the face of the independent woman."
translation.de: du das Gesicht der unabhängigen Frau.

translation.en: "We cleaved to each other across that space."
translation.de: Wir haben uns über den Raum gespalten."

translation.en: [George] You're back later than I thought. Am I?
The fridge is empty.
I can go out, pick up some food for us.
-What do you feel like? -I, uh… I ate with Justine.
translation.de: -Wonach ist dir? -Ich aß schon mit Justine.

translation.en: [George] Brilliant setting for a faculty meeting, Floyd.
translation.de: Brillante Kulisse für eine Fakultätssitzung, Floyd.

translation.en: [Floyd] Yes. I take her out alone a lot, which would seem selfish.
translation.de: Ja. Ich fahre sie oft allein, was egoistisch erscheint.

translation.en: I used to sail a bit myself. Grew up on the Connecticut coast.
translation.de: Ich segelte auch. Ich wuchs an der Küste von Connecticut auf.

translation.en: Oh, that's right. Do your family own a boat?
translation.de: Oh, das stimmt. Besitzt deine Familie ein Boot?

translation.en: I inherited my cousin's. The Lost Horizon.
translation.de: Ich erbte das meines Cousins. Die Lost Horizon.

translation.en: He actually drowned while sailing it.
Oh, how sad.
Yeah. Only 19.
-Mm. -Already so sophisticated.
I remember when he died.
translation.de: Ich weiß noch, als er starb.

translation.en: I stole his diary after the funeral. Read it repeatedly.
translation.de: Ich klaute sein Tagebuch nach der Beerdigung. Las es immer wieder.

translation.en: I know it's-- it's an awful thing to do,
but I… I think I needed some sort of… connection.
translation.de: aber ich brauchte eine Art… Verbindung.

translation.en: Did you learn anything from it?
Yeah, a little.
He was gay, unhappy.
Typical tortured artist.
And then all that angst one unfortunate moment vanishes forever.
translation.de: Und dann verschwindet die ganze Angst in einem unglücklichen Moment für immer.

translation.en: We're all so inconsequential, Floyd.
translation.de: Wir sind alle so belanglos, Floyd.

translation.en: Swedenborg would suggest otherwise.
He'd say death is only the beginning.
translation.de: Er sagte, der Tod sei nur der Anfang.

translation.en: Have you read the book yet?
translation.de: Hast du das Buch schon gelesen?

translation.en: [George] It's on the top of my list.
translation.de: Es steht ganz oben auf meiner Liste.

translation.en: -[George] Come, come in. -Ahh. Cath?
Let me get that.
Hello.
Oh, Catherine, this is Floyd DeBeers, head of our department.
He also took me on this magnificent boat ride.
translation.de: Er nahm mich mit auf diese wunderbare Bootsfahrt.

translation.en: So good to meet you.
So, in return, I invited him to our house, a very unfair trade.
translation.de: Im Gegenzug lud ich ihn zu uns ein, ein unfairer Handel.

translation.en: -I've heard wonderful things about you. -As I have you.
translation.de: -Ich habe viel Gutes über Sie gehört. -Und ich über Sie.

translation.en: George, is this some kind of setup?
[Catherine chuckles] What?
[chuckling] I-- I swear to God, I didn't even tell her you were coming.
translation.de: Ich schwöre, ich habe ihr nicht mal gesagt, dass du kommst.

translation.en: You see, George? You see? There are no coincidences.
translation.de: Siehst du, George? Es gibt keine Zufälle.

translation.en: I'm sorry. I-- I was taken by the artwork and just started reading it.
translation.de: Tut mir leid. Das Bild faszinierte mich, also las ich es.

translation.en: [George] Nothing to be sorry for.
You do know what this is, don't you? The cover art?
translation.de: Sie wissen, was das ist? Das Titelbild?

translation.en: It's a soul transitioning into the afterlife.
translation.de: Es ist eine Seele, die ins Jenseits übergeht.

translation.en: [Catherine] Really?
[Floyd] The painter followed Swedenborg,
so he believed that death is parallel to birth, but divine.
translation.de: also glaubte er, der Tod sei parallel zur Geburt, aber göttlich.

translation.en: [George] Floyd, believe me.
You do not want to get my wife started on all that, uh, stuff.
translation.de: Du willst nicht, dass meine Frau damit anfängt.

translation.en: [chuckles awkwardly] Uh, Cath, please show Floyd around.
Um, I'm gonna fix us some cocktails.
translation.de: Ich mache uns ein paar Cocktails.

translation.en: May I show you around?
-I can't wait. -Great.
My daughter's asleep already,
but you can-- we can peek in her room.
translation.de: aber wir können in ihr Zimmer lugen.

translation.en: We actually have four bedrooms, but we only use two of them.
translation.de: Wir haben vier Schlafzimmer, nutzen aber nur zwei.

translation.en: A young couple can't have too many bed--
translation.de: Ein junges Paar kann nicht genug Schlaf…

translation.en: You okay?
[whispering] We're not alone, are we?
What do you mean?
She doesn't mean any harm.
She has reasons for lingering.
[whispering] I've seen her, and so has my daughter.
translation.de: Ich habe sie gesehen, und meine Tochter auch.

translation.en: Because she's here for you.
-She wants you to know that. -[cries]
translation.de: Sie will, dass Sie das wissen.

translation.en: At first, I was terrified, of course, but now…
translation.de: Zuerst hatte ich Angst, natürlich, aber jetzt…

translation.en: every time I sense her, I-- I feel…
translation.de: Jedes Mal, wenn ich sie spüre, fühle ich mich…

translation.en: comfort.
-I know that doesn't make any sense. -It makes perfect sense.
translation.de: -Ich weiß, das ergibt keinen Sinn. -Es ergibt Sinn.

translation.en: Her name is Smit, wife of Jacob Smit.
translation.de: Sie heißt Smit, Frau von Jacob Smit.

translation.en: He was a… um, a local minister.
They built this house, and that's all I can find at the library.
translation.de: Sie haben das Haus gebaut, mehr fand ich in der Bibliothek nicht.

translation.en: Let me do some digging on campus.
You can't tell George because he can't know. He thinks that I'm crazy.
translation.de: George darf es nicht erfahren. Er hält mich für verrückt.

translation.en: No, of course not.
He's just afraid, you know.
Men at his stage of life often are. But try and be patient, Catherine.
translation.de: Männer in seiner Lebensphase sind oft so. Aber seien Sie geduldig, Catherine.

translation.en: With love, he can catch up to you spiritually.
translation.de: Mit Liebe kann er Sie spirituell einholen.

translation.en: And let us…
Let us hold a séance here.
translation.de: Lassen Sie uns hier eine Séance abhalten.

translation.en: -With or without George. -Really?
We can find out a little more about your housemate.
translation.de: Wir können mehr über Ihre Mitbewohnerin herausfinden.

translation.en: [George] Bye, Floyd.
Good night, good night, and thanks for a wonderful evening.
translation.de: Gute Nacht und danke für einen schönen Abend.

translation.en: [George] Drive safe.
My God, Cath, he absolutely adored you.
translation.de: Mein Gott, Cath, er hat dich total verehrt.

translation.en: I-- I have never seen Floyd light up like that around anyone.
translation.de: Ich habe noch nie gesehen, dass Floyd bei einem so aufleuchtete.

translation.en: And you were up there awhile. Did he say anything?
translation.de: Und ihr wart eine Weile da oben. Hat er was gesagt?

translation.en: About what?
About me?
He said that you were an exceptional professor.
translation.de: Er sagte, du bist ein außergewöhnlicher Professor.

translation.en: And you are an exceptional wife,
translation.de: Und du bist eine außergewöhnliche Frau,

translation.en: which means the world to me.
Ah! I feel like having company was good for us.
translation.de: Ich glaube, Gesellschaft tut uns gut.

translation.en: Yeah? We need this.
I, uh… I want to invite my whole department over. A-- a real party. What do you think?
translation.de: Ich möchte mein ganzes Institut einladen. Eine richtige Party. Was meinst du?

translation.en: I think we owe it to Franny to make this place a happy home.
translation.de: Wir sind es Franny schuldig, hier ein glückliches Zuhause zu schaffen.

translation.en: I'm not against it. I just think that we need to then also invite
translation.de: Ich bin nicht dagegen. Ich denke, wir müssen dann auch die Einheimischen

translation.en: the locals and our neighbors.
Neighbors? [chuckles] Really?
I need to feel like I'm in this community, George, not just your community.
translation.de: Ich will das Gefühl haben, in dieser Gemeinschaft zu sein, nicht nur deiner.

translation.en: Okay, let's do it.
Please tell me again why I'm carrying a Bundt cake.
translation.de: Sag mir noch mal, warum ich einen Gugelhupf habe.

translation.en: We're no good at parties. Speak for yourself.
I am. Nobody wants the sheriff around when they're drunk.
translation.de: Ja. Niemand will den Sheriff, wenn er betrunken ist.

translation.en: Uh, more wine?
Hi. Wine?
A little. Just… just…
Oh! Okay, good.
She's a friend of Bram's.
translation.de: Sie ist eine Freundin von Bram.

translation.en: She's also writing.
They both have been writing novels… Sorry. They both have been writing novels.
translation.de: Ja. Sie haben beide Romane geschrieben. Tut mir leid.

translation.en: I first wore glasses when I was 13.
translation.de: Meine erste Brille bekam ich mit 13.

translation.en: Oh, thank you. Thank you, young man.
Yes. You've done a lot with this place.
I want you to meet my wife Millicent, the love of my life.
translation.de: Das ist meine Frau Millicent, die Liebe meines Lebens.

translation.en: It's incredibly nice to meet you.
I hear we might have a session in your home.
translation.de: Ich hörte von einer Sitzung hier.

translation.en: Yeah, soon, I hope. Thank you.
George? Travis, Mare's husband.
-A pleasure to meet you. -This is her best cake. [laughing] Oh, wow.
translation.de: -Travis, sehr erfreut. -Das ist ihr bester Kuchen.

translation.en: Thank you. We'll put it right here.
[Mare] Travis? Come here. You've got to hear this.
translation.de: Travis? Komm mal her. Das musst du hören.

translation.en: Yes, dear.
Hm. I almost baked a cake.
translation.de: Ich hätte fast einen Kuchen gebacken.

translation.en: Bram insisted there was something you might appreciate… even more.
translation.de: Bram meinte aber, das würdest du mehr schätzen.

translation.en: [sniffs] Oh, fantastic.
-[chuckles] -Um, shall we?
-Yeah. Why not? -Why not?
-This place looks marvelous, Catherine. -Thank you.
Absolutely transformed.
Well, a little paint goes a really long way.
translation.de: Na ja, ein bisschen Farbe macht viel aus.

translation.en: [sighs] And it does my heart good to see Eddie and Cole here.
translation.de: Und es tut mir gut, Eddie und Cole hier zu sehen.

translation.en: -You're a saint for having them back. -What do you mean?
translation.de: -Sie sind eine Heilige, sie zurückzuholen. -Was meinen Sie?

translation.en: Well, they grew up here.
You-- you knew that, didn't you?
I-I-It's just that I told George the whole story when I first showed him the house and--
translation.de: Ich habe George bei der Hausbesichtigung die ganze Geschichte erzählt…

translation.en: What story?
I suppose he-- he didn't wanna upset you.
translation.de: Er wollte Sie wohl nicht aufregen.

translation.en: -I-- I'm going to go find Travis. -No, no, no. What story, Mare?
He didn't tell you anything about their parents? Hm-mm.
translation.de: Er hat Ihnen nichts über ihre Eltern erzählt?

translation.en: [sighs] Well… it's just that…
Dear Ella, she was a friend of mine, you know, and… and…
translation.de: Die liebe Ella, sie war eine Freundin von mir…

translation.en: Sometimes, I can't help but believe that she…
translation.de: Manchmal stelle ich mir einfach vor, dass sie…

translation.en: She's free now.
And-- and I know he struggled financially,
translation.de: Und ich weiß, er hatte finanzielle Probleme,

translation.en: but that horrible man was cruel in-- in ways that you could never know.
translation.de: aber dieser furchtbare Mann war grausam auf jegliche Weise.

translation.en: What happened to them?
Catherine, it's not the time. I don't want to ruin your party.
translation.de: Nicht jetzt. Ich will die Party nicht ruinieren.

translation.en: No, no.
Mare, I'm begging you. I need to know this.
translation.de: Mare, ich bitte Sie. Ich muss es wissen.

translation.en: All right.
The way I… I heard it
translation.de: So, wie ich es gehört habe,

translation.en: was that… Calvin Vayle
slipped Ella and the boys
translation.de: Ella und die Jungs eines Nachts

translation.en: a sedative one night.
And… when they were out cold, he…
He went outside and shot every one of the cows they owned.
translation.de: Er ging raus und erschoss alle ihre Kühe.

translation.en: Oh my God.
And then, when he was finished, he went into the garage below their…
translation.de: Und als er fertig war, ging er in die Garage, unter ihrem Schlafzimmer,

translation.en: bedroom,
started the ignition of two trucks and closed the windows.
translation.de: startete zwei Trucks und schloss die Fenster.

translation.en: The fumes.
Then he went up and…
laid down in bed with Ella until--
translation.de: und legte sich zu Ella ins Bett, bis…

translation.en: -Oh my God, I was wrong. -They never woke up.
translation.de: -Gott, ich irrte mich. -Sie wachten nie auf.

translation.en: I had the wrong wife. I--
-Wrong about what? -Your friend Ella. She's here, Mare.
Oh my God. Where did you get this? Wh-what are you doing with this?
translation.de: Oh mein Gott. Wo haben Sie den her? Was machen Sie damit?

translation.en: She never took this ring off.
translation.de: Sie legte den Ring nie ab.

translation.en: You know what?
I've been in this house for three months, and nobody has said anything to me.
translation.de: Ich bin seit drei Monaten im Haus. Niemand hat mir etwas gesagt.

translation.en: Not the mailman, not a neighbor, not-- not the bank teller.
translation.de: Nicht der Postbote, kein Nachbar, kein Bankangestellter.

translation.en: God, I'm such a fool!
translation.de: Gott, ich bin so eine Idiotin!

translation.en: No, no, it's not like that.
-Oh my God! -Catherine, we're from farm stock up here.
It's-- it's not our way to get involved with people's personal business.
translation.de: Es ist nicht unsere Art, sich bei anderen einzumischen.

translation.en: You've made this home so warm and inviting,
translation.de: Sie haben das Haus so warm und einladend gemacht.

translation.en: and everyone's moved on so well. I'm sure that George didn't mean--
translation.de: Alle haben damit abgeschlossen. George wollte sicher nicht…

translation.en: Do not waste any of your time on George, Mare.
translation.de: Ich will das Wort George nicht hören.

translation.en: George Claire always gets exactly what he wants.
translation.de: George Claire bekommt immer genau das, was er will.

translation.en: You don't know anything about me.
I do.
I know you're a weaver of fabrics.
translation.de: Ich weiß, dass du Stoffe fabrizierst.

translation.en: And ideas.
Like the ideas you've been putting in my wife's head lately.
translation.de: Wie die Ideen, die du meiner Frau in den Kopf gesetzt hast.

translation.en: Okay.
Here's something about me you don't know.
translation.de: Hier ist etwas über mich, das du nicht weißt.

translation.en: I get suspicious
when students worship their professors.
Always leads to trouble.
Is that a dig or advice?
translation.de: Ist das Kritik oder ein Rat?

translation.en: Oh, it's just honesty. You know, like the Good Book says.
translation.de: Es ist nur Ehrlichkeit. Wie es in der Bibel steht.

translation.en: "The truth will set you free."
I don't know about that.
People really don't want the truth, and they certainly don't want to be set free.
translation.de: Die Leute wollen die Wahrheit nicht und wollen nicht frei sein.

translation.en: What? Says who?
The Eagles, remember?
-"Hotel California." -[Justine laughs]
Yeah. We, uh-- we all choose our own prison.
translation.de: Ja. Wir wählen alle unser Gefängnis.

translation.en: Here, give me your hands.
I'll show you why they're right. Here.
translation.de: Ich zeige dir, warum sie recht haben.

translation.en: -You're going to read my palms now? -Come on.
translation.de: -Du liest mir aus der Hand? -Komm schon.

translation.en: Okay.
Now,
try to get yourself free.
[grunts] Okay, that's enough. You can let go now, George.
translation.de: Ok, das reicht. Du kannst jetzt loslassen, George.

translation.en: Yeah, I know I can, but are you sure you really want me to?
translation.de: Ich weiß, ich kann das, aber willst du das wirklich?

translation.en: -I'm very sure. -Oh.
George, you-- you are hurting me now.
Let go!
W-what?
-[laughing] -Jesus Christ, George.
[George] Good night.
-Drive safe. -[door closes]
Well,
that was a success, huh?
Your friend Justine is a bit of a head case.
translation.de: Deine Freundin Justine ist etwas verrückt.

translation.en: Is she trying to start some trouble or something?
No, I didn't see Justine all night, but it's interesting that you ask.
translation.de: Nein, ich sah Justine heute gar nicht, aber interessant, dass du fragst.

translation.en: Know what's interesting to me?
translation.de: Weißt du, was ich interessant finde?

translation.en: Is that this party was supposed to bring you and me together,
translation.de: Diese Party sollte dich und mich näherbringen,

translation.en: and as soon as everyone leaves, you retreat and ice up.
translation.de: aber sobald alle weg sind, machst du wieder dicht.

translation.en: How could you not tell me about this house, George?
translation.de: Wie konntest du mir nichts von diesem Haus erzählen?

translation.en: [George sighs] Jesus.
[sighs] I was afraid this might happen.
That one of your lies would be exposed?
I wasn't lying to you, Cath. I was trying to spare you some unpleasantness.
translation.de: Ich habe dich nicht angelogen, Cath. Ich wollte dir Unangenehmes ersparen.

translation.en: I can handle unpleasantness, George, okay? I lived through childbirth, remember?
translation.de: Ich kann mit Unannehmlichkeiten umgehen. Ich habe die Geburt durchlebt.

translation.en: I was trying to protect you.
Believe-- believe it or not, I-I actually wanted you to be happy here.
translation.de: Ob du es glaubst oder nicht, ich wollte, dass du hier glücklich bist.

translation.en: What the fuck is that?
Fucking electricity in this house!
[George] What the…
The fuck is going on?
Franny's overdue for a visit with your parents. You can finish off the weekend there.
translation.de: Franny sollte mal wieder zu deinen Eltern. Du kannst das Wochenende dort beenden.

translation.en: -[answering machine beeps] -Floyd, it's Catherine.
translation.de: ZWEI VERDÄCHTIGE ERSTICKUNGSTODE Floyd, hier ist Catherine.

translation.en: I'm ready.
This is her. This is Ella Vayle,
translation.de: Das ist sie. Das ist Ella Vayle,

translation.en: and this is the article I found about her death.
translation.de: und das ist der Artikel über ihren Tod.

translation.en: But she's trying to…
She's reaching out to me, and I-I need to know why.
translation.de: Sie kontaktiert mich, ich muss wissen, warum.

translation.en: You're saying the spirit is the most recent resident of your house?
translation.de: Sie sagen, der Geist ist der letzte Bewohner Ihres Hauses?

translation.en: Yes. I was confused before.
Well, my research turned up something interesting about the original owners,
translation.de: Meine Recherche ergab etwas Interessantes über die ursprünglichen Besitzer,

translation.en: especially for our group here.
What? The Smits?
Reverend Smit's wife was an early devotee of Swedenborg.
translation.de: Reverend Smits Frau war eine frühe Anhängerin von Swedenborg.

translation.en: [Floyd] Unfortunately, it was not a happy marriage.
translation.de: Leider war es keine glückliche Ehe.

translation.en: Smit was a strict Calvinist
who strongly disapproved of his wife's philosophic exploration.
translation.de: der die philosophische Forschung seiner Frau ablehnte.

translation.en: "Damned."
[Floyd] She died in their home
rather mysteriously at age 26.
So much death in my house.
translation.de: So viel Tod in meinem Haus.

translation.en: Oh, no, no. Don't think of it that way.
translation.de: Oh nein. Sie sollten das nicht so sehen.

translation.en: We embrace inhabited houses as a blessing.
translation.de: Wir erachten bewohnte Häuser als Segen.

translation.en: -[Floyd] Mm. -[Millicent] Portals between two realms
with guides to shepherd us once our own time comes.
translation.de: mit Führern, die uns leiten, wenn unsere Zeit kommt.

translation.en: Some religions call them guardian angels.
Perhaps it's our Swedenborgian friend who first opened the portal door.
translation.de: Vielleicht öffnete ja unsere Swedenborg-Freundin dieses Portal.

translation.en: We are good at that.
[Millicent] Because it's the afterlife where we reach our greatest purpose.
translation.de: Denn im Jenseits erreichen wir unseren größten Zweck.

translation.en: [laughs] You never see these spirits as potentially evil?
translation.de: Sehen Sie diese Geister nie als potenziell böse?

translation.en: An evil spirit will only commune with an evil-doer.
translation.de: Ein böser Geist kommuniziert nur mit einem Bösen.

translation.en: [Floyd] Which we will take, on a leap of faith, that you're not.
translation.de: Und wir vertrauen darauf, Sie sind keiner.

translation.en: -[group laughs] -[local man] And remember.
Evil only thrives in the house where it is welcome.
translation.de: das Böse gedeiht nur in dem Haus, wo es willkommen ist.

translation.en: -[Floyd] Mm. -[local woman] Goodness always triumphs.
Always. If not in this world, then in the next.
translation.de: Immer. Wenn nicht in dieser Welt, dann in der nächsten.

translation.en: [Floyd] We should start,
yes?
Let whomever the spirit is
speak for herself.
[ghostly voice] As evil comes to light,
translation.de: Wenn das Böse ans Licht kommt,

translation.en: beware!
[Floyd] She's making her presence known. We welcome her, don't we, Catherine?
translation.de: Sie gibt sich zu erkennen. Wir heißen sie willkommen, oder, Catherine?

translation.en: We do. We… I-- I do.
[ghostly voice 2] Get back here!
-[ghostly voice] No! -[ghostly voice 2] Ella.
-[Catherine] What happened? -[Floyd] She wants to break through. She's trying.
translation.de: -Was ist passiert? -Sie will durchbrechen. Sie versucht es.

translation.en: But something, someone is stopping her.
translation.de: Aber irgendwas, irgendjemand hält sie auf.

translation.en: [ghostly voice] You're suffocating me!
[Catherine] What was that? Oh my God.
translation.de: Was war das? Oh mein Gott.

translation.en: I'm afraid this home has another spirit.
translation.de: Ich fürchte, das Haus hat noch einen Geist.

translation.en: And until that spirit reveals its nature,
translation.de: Und bis dieser Geist sich offenbart,

translation.en: be careful of those around you, Catherine.
translation.de: seien Sie achtsam, wer um Sie ist.

translation.en: -[Franny] Mama, Mama! -Hi, baby.
Come here. Did you have fun at Grandma and Grandpa's house?
translation.de: Komm her. Hattest du Spaß bei Oma und Opa?

translation.en: -Yeah. -Did you look for seashells on the beach?
translation.de: -Ja. -Hast du am Strand nach Muscheln gesucht?

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -Really? Are they pretty? Yeah!
Keep moving, everyone. Hustle. We don't wanna get caught in traffic on the way into the city.
translation.de: Los, Leute. Wir wollen keinen Stau auf dem Weg in die Stadt.

translation.en: Nearly there, nearly full.
Tommy, good. Thank you for com--
I, uh, I didn't know you were joining us.
translation.de: Ich wusste nicht, dass du mitkommst.

translation.en: Floyd wanted an additional chaperone.
[student] I'm here!
Right, Katie. You're the last.
[Franny] Where are we going?
Get in the car, baby. I'll be there in a sec.
translation.de: Steig ins Auto, Baby. Ich bin gleich da.

translation.en: There's something I have to give you that I, uh…
translation.de: Ich muss dir etwas geben, das ich…

translation.en: found in the house a while back before I learned the truth.
translation.de: Ich fand es im Haus, bevor ich die Wahrheit kannte.

translation.en: It's a little bit tight on me.
-Just leave it. -No, no, it belongs to you and Cole.
translation.de: -Schon gut. -Nein, er gehört dir und Cole.

translation.en: She would want you to have this.
I don't want it.
I noticed it on you a couple weeks ago.
translation.de: Ich habe ihn vor ein paar Wochen bemerkt.

translation.en: It just seemed right.
You and Mom would have liked each other.
translation.de: Sie und Mom hätten sich gemocht.

translation.en: Three on the bottom are on time.
translation.de: Die drei unten sind pünktlich. Ich fand ein überfälliges

translation.en: I found that overdue one in my husband's car, I can pay the fine.
translation.de: Die drei unten sind pünktlich. Ich fand ein überfälliges im Auto meines Mannes, ich zahle die Strafe.

translation.en: It's just on his card.
translation.de: Es ist nur auf seiner Karte.

translation.en: Actually, this one's checked out under the name Willis Howell.
translation.de: Das hier ist unter dem Namen Willis Howell.

translation.en: Oh, that's odd.
It's unisex, you know?
Excuse me? The name, Willis.
She's a pretty thing. In here a lot on weekends.
translation.de: Sie ist hübsch. Am Wochenende kommt sie oft.

translation.en: Daddy's friend.
Don't worry. I'll ask her to pay the fine.
translation.de: Keine Sorge. Sie bezahlt die Strafe.

translation.en: I'd like to open a new account.
translation.de: Ich möchte ein neues Konto eröffnen.

translation.en: Of course, Mrs. Claire.
Uh, just… just fill out, um, this form.
translation.de: Füllen Sie einfach… dieses Formular aus.

translation.en: Uh, we will require George's signature if it's a joint account.
translation.de: Wir brauchen Georges Unterschrift bei einem Gemeinschaftskonto.

translation.en: It's not.
[George] Okay, everyone. Here we are.
[man] George Claire?
[chuckles] Good God.
Dr. Warren. Wow. [chuckles]
What an odd coincidence.
Odd indeed.
I was told that you had moved away for good.
translation.de: Mir wurde gesagt, Sie wären weggezogen.

translation.en: Well, I, you know, couldn't resist coming back for this exhibit.
translation.de: Für diese Ausstellung musste ich zurückkommen.

translation.en: You might remember my passion for Thomas Cole.
Yes, I do. I just wish you had shown the same passion for your dissertation.
translation.de: Ja. Ich wünschte, Sie hätten dieselbe Leidenschaft für die Dissertation gezeigt.

translation.en: Excuse me. Professor Claire, um,
in the third Voyage of Life painting, why is the sailor so distraught?
translation.de: Wieso die Verzweiflung des Matrosen auf dem dritten Bild Die Reise des Lebens?

translation.en: Oh, the third one is called, uh, Manhood.
Uh, it's when Cole believes we, uh, we lose the confidence of youth.
translation.de: Da glaubt Cole, dass wir das Vertrauen der Jugend verlieren.

translation.en: Uh, go-- go check out the sailor's hands. They're no longer on the tiller.
translation.de: Achtet auf die Hände des Matrosen. Sie sind nicht mehr am Ruder.

translation.en: -[student] Thanks, Professor Claire. -[Dr. Warren clears throat]
Yeah… You know, I'm curious. Um…
How did you get a teaching position without a recommendation?
translation.de: Wie haben Sie ohne Empfehlung eine Lehrstelle bekommen?

translation.en: Oh, I'm, um, I'm just a temp instructor.
Um, one of the professors took an emergency leave, and I, uh…
translation.de: Einer der Professoren nahm einen Noturlaub, und ich…

translation.en: I just stepped in to help.
Interesting, then, how the students, uh, they call you professor.
translation.de: Interessant, dass die Studierenden Sie Professor nennen.

translation.en: [chuckling awkwardly] Yeah, yeah.
Uh, yeah, right. I keep correcting them.
Yeah. I get so tired of correcting them.
translation.de: Ja. Ich bin es leid, sie zu korrigieren.

translation.en: Good day, Claire.
What…
What was all that about?
Uh, yeah, I have no idea.
I kind of think you do.
I don't think you should see Justine anymore.
translation.de: Du solltest Justine nicht mehr treffen.

translation.en: There's a lot of talk about her at Saginaw.
translation.de: Am Saginaw wird viel über sie geredet.

translation.en: What kind of talk, George?
Well, they say she's a closet lesbian.
translation.de: Sie soll eine verkappte Lesbe sein.

translation.en: And she's clearly obsessed with you.
translation.de: Und sie ist von dir besessen.

translation.en: [sighs] I think she is…
instigating problems between us intentionally.
[George] Floyd, heading home for the holiday? [Floyd] What?
translation.de: -Floyd, auf dem Weg in die Ferien? -Was?

translation.en: Oh, no, no. Not for a while yet. I-I still have, uh…
translation.de: Oh nein. Noch nicht. Ich habe noch…

translation.en: -I have work to finish. -Is something wrong?
translation.de: -Ich habe noch zu tun. -Stimmt was nicht?

translation.en: Actually,
I got a call this morning from Shelby Warren,
translation.de: Shelby Warren rief mich heute an,

translation.en: your advisor from Columbia.
His recommendation letter, the one submitted with your application,
translation.de: Sein Empfehlungsschreiben, das aus deiner Bewerbung,

translation.en: he claims he never wrote it.
Shelby's recollection is that you asked him,
translation.de: Shelby erinnert sich, dass du ihn fragtest,

translation.en: but he told you he couldn't do it.
In good conscience. I remember the conversation well.
translation.de: Guten Gewissens. Ich erinnere mich an das Gespräch.

translation.en: -You forged it, didn't you? -No. I… I…
Floyd, I wrote the letter that I deserved.
translation.de: Ich habe den Brief geschrieben, den ich verdient habe.

translation.en: I-- I-- You need to understand why.
As you know, I'm quite fond of you, George,
translation.de: Wie du weißt, mag ich dich sehr,

translation.en: and you're popular with your students, but this is a serious accusation.
translation.de: und du bist beliebt bei den Studierenden, aber diese Anschuldigung ist ernst.

translation.en: Can't we put a pin in this until after the holiday? -Oh… -Please, please, Floyd.
translation.de: Können wir das nach den Ferien klären? Bitte, Floyd.

translation.en: I-- I understand your dilemma. I do.
Floyd, I-- I have my entire family up here.
translation.de: Floyd, ich habe meine ganze Familie hier.

translation.en: I'm supposed to be home in an hour.
translation.de: Ich muss in einer Stunde heim.

translation.en: I-- I really deserve the chance to sit down and be heard.
translation.de: Ich verdiene die Chance, angehört zu werden.

translation.en: Man to man, huh?
Friend to friend.
I'll schedule an appointment.
[man] I know you all think that Audrey is a quite calm, conservative soul,
translation.de: Ihr denkt alle, Audrey ist eine ruhige, konservative Seele,

translation.en: but back in the day, she was absolutely wild.
translation.de: aber damals war sie absolut wild.

translation.en: -Don't believe a word! -And then George came along.
And he was always getting into trouble, which is why I went gray by 30.
translation.de: Er bekam immer Ärger, deshalb wurde ich mit 30 grau.

translation.en: [Audrey] Oh, stop!
But the real troublemaker was this cousin that George idolized.
translation.de: -Hör auf! -Aber der wahre Unruhestifter war dieser Cousin, den George verehrte. Ein erstklassiger Homo.

translation.en: Turned out to be a first-class homo.
translation.de: war dieser Cousin, den George verehrte. Ein erstklassiger Homo.

translation.en: I don't know what was worse for his parents: that he drowned or was gay.
translation.de: Keine Ahnung, was schlimmer war für seine Eltern: Sein Ertrinken oder Schwulsein.

translation.en: That is a truly repugnant thing to say.
She's right, Tom.
Henry's death was a family tragedy.
He was such a talented young man.
Henry used to do these exquisite watercolors. Teeny-tiny paintings.
translation.de: Henry malte diese exquisiten Aquarelle. Klitzekleine Bilder.

translation.en: What were the… the paintings of?
Oh, the shoreline, ospreys, lighthouses.
Just common seaside things.
Turkey time, everybody.
It's the way he presented them that was unique.
translation.de: Seine Darstellung der Dinge war einzigartig.

translation.en: They even wanted to do a showing of his work after he passed, but…
translation.de: Sie wollten seine Arbeiten ausstellen, nachdem er starb, aber.…

translation.en: they all just disappeared, apparently.
-[Catherine's mom] What a shame. -It really was.
-[man] Nice job on the turkey, George. -Thank you.
Please, eat. It's gonna get cold.
Could you excuse me one minute?
So you're starting with all this again?
translation.de: Geht das wieder von vorne los?

translation.en: I happen to be sick, George.
Throwing up my marriage.
Now leave me the fuck alone!
-Catherine… -[door slams, lock clicks]
[George] What the fuck?
[Audrey] George?
[Ella] Please.
Please.
[male ghostly voice] No one understands us.
I am here for you.
Free yourself.
[Floyd, in distance] How was your holiday?
Hello, Floyd.
I didn't expect to see you till tomorrow.
translation.de: Ich habe dich erst morgen erwartet.

translation.en: Taking advantage of the warm spell we're having, huh?
translation.de: Du nutzt das warme Wetter aus, was?

translation.en: Yeah, I thought I'd go out one last time before storing her for winter.
translation.de: Ich wollte noch mal raus, bevor es ins Winterlager kommt.

translation.en: You're so lucky to have her.
translation.de: Du hast Glück, es zu haben.

translation.en: That last spin you took me on, it… [grunts] …it really reminded me how much I-- I miss sailing.

translation.en: Especially when…
when I'm feeling a little… a little low.
You want to join me?
Oh, no. I-- I…
-I don't want to in-- intrude. -It's fine.
The river's as good a place as any to have our talk.

translation.en: What's the matter? Are you okay?
Things…
just aren't great.
It's him, isn't it?
I know his kind all too well.

translation.en: I grew up with it.
If I had someone as good as you, I'd kiss the fucking ground she walked on. I swear to God.
translation.de: Hätte ich jemanden wie Sie, würde ich den Boden küssen. Ich schwöre bei Gott.

translation.en: [George] I'm eager to tell you the truth

translation.en: about the…
problems I had at Columbia with… with Shelby.
translation.de: …meine Probleme mit Shelby an der Columbia.

translation.en: Look, it's a complicated story, but, um…
essentially,
I got ostracized…
for reporting misconduct.
It was… it was sexual misconduct.
Look, I'm willing to listen, because I-- I care about your well-being,
translation.de: Ich will dir zuhören, denn dein Wohlergehen ist mir wichtig,

translation.en: but forgery,
regardless of the reason,
is a crime.
I don't want us meeting on false pretenses here.
translation.de: Ich will nicht, dass wir uns unter falschem Vorwand treffen.

translation.en: I can't keep this to myself forever.

translation.en: Yeah, I-I understand that, and-and, look, I appreciate your dilemma--

translation.en: So…
So tomorrow, I plan to bring the situation to HR.
translation.de: Morgen sage ich es der Personalabteilung.

translation.en: And we both know the outcome.

translation.en: They won't permit you to remain on staff.
You okay, George?
There, there.
All things must pass.
Yeah.
I promise you'll get through this.
-Hey, Cal. -Hey.
I called in a take-out order.
Be right back.
[chuckles] Excuse me. Sorry, I just wonder…

translation.en: Where did you buy that scarf?

translation.en: It was a gift.
[Cal] There you go, $6.57.
Thanks. Just two back, please.
You're putting in late nights too, huh, George?
Jesus.
Look--
You're soaking wet.
[laughs] What-- what the fuck, Justine?

Officially? No.
Then why are you suddenly everywhere I turn?

translation.en: Because I really care about Catherine.

translation.en: Yeah, you've made that perfectly clear.

translation.en: Uh, I'm not sure how to take that.
I-- I kind of think that you do.
Tell me, George, how'd your mom like that scarf I made her?

translation.en: Uh, yeah, she…
She didn't really care for it, actually.
translation.de: Sie fand ihn nicht so gut.

translation.en: She… she said that it felt cheap.
Well, that explains the neck it ended up on, then, huh?
translation.de: Das erklärt den Hals, an dem er endete.

translation.en: Go fuck yourself.
Do you want to explain what happened at the Met?

translation.en: If you got something to say to me, Justine, you should just spit it out.

translation.en: [Justine] I will.
[reporter on radio] Government said there was no way they would meet the new demands for the hostages' release.

You and I need to talk.

a frequent fixture of the Hudson sailing community.
What?

translation.en: Oh… oh my God.
[exhales sharply] Jesus.
Yeah.
I know you two became very close very quickly,

translation.en: so I-I'll keep you posted on the memorial service.

Your name came up,
if you'd be willing.
Oh God, um…
Yeah, yeah.

I have some very sad news to report.

Huh? Who did this?
Is this some kind of joke?
Who did this? Huh?
Who did this?
[yelling] Who the fuck is responsible for this?
Well, fuck it. [breathing shakily]

Did you cancel your class?

Well, you… [scoffs]

Thanks.

translation.en: Right.
Well, that's good. We can… We can sit down, have that chat you've been pushing for.

Why not tonight? You said it was extremely important.

translation.en: No, she's out cold, George. No, she's…

Why is she dressed?

translation.en: It's a terrible time to travel.
Hey, where are you going?
-Jesus! -Get downstairs.
Get off!
-Get off of me! -Hey, Catherine!
What are you doing, huh? What the hell is this?

Where do you think you're going? With my goddamn daughter!

Nowhere's home with you, George!
Fuck!

No!
[screaming] Help!

Where did he put you?

[Catherine] Baby?

for the power to stop this.
[Catherine, distorted] Baby.
Where is…

As she was there for me,
translation.de: Da sie für mich da war,

[male ghostly voice] No.
-[male ghostly voice] Stop this! -[Ella] No!
[male ghostly voice] George.
[male ghostly voice] George.
Free yourself.

-[splatting] -[male ghostly voice] Again!

translation.en: Franny should take her usual nap.
Her sippy cup is prepared in the fridge. Make sure she drinks it.

[Cole] Bye, Mrs. Claire.
Feel better.
Laughton residence.

translation.en: It's…

29-year-old Catherine Claire was found brutally murdered

You've heard.

[woman] Here it comes.

What's your gut?

translation.en: You are not speaking to anyone until we secure a criminal attorney.

translation.en: From Manhattan.
First thing in the morning, we're leaving this godforsaken place for Connecticut.

Threaten her?
[exhales] No, no, I never…
She just told me that she hated him.

Lots of husbands hate their wives.

translation.en: Fuck, man!
So he has a solid alibi? He was at work all day.

No.

[Ella and Catherine] Justine, it's time.

Yes.
I'll just…

Damned.
Damned.

We have lost our children.
Because of you,
we are joined in spirit.
